d1_text:
Npc0104:
ï¿½I recently read a book titled ï¿½Our Convenient Society.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It said that our modern society demands[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½that there always be an ATM in hotels and drugstores.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Just knowing that is convenient![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'm glad I read the book...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I can't believe I didn't know this stuff.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'll check whether or not we have an ATM in our drugstore...[HALT][END]
